{"id":502151344,"lang":"cpp","time":"9 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1622683645,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/502151344/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if(n==0) return 1.00000;\n        if(x==0) return 0.00000;\n        double res=1;\n        if(n>0){\n            while(n>0){\n            if(n%2) res*=x;\n            n>>=1;\n            x*=x;            \n            }            \n        }\n        else{\n            n=abs(n);\n            while(n>0){\n            if(n%2) res/=x;\n            n>>=1;\n            x*=x;            \n            }   \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
